scripts.theia:install: npm run theia:setup && yarn --cwd writenow-theia install --frozen-lockfile
scripts.theia:build:browser: npm run theia:install && yarn --cwd writenow-theia build:browser
scripts.theia:build:electron: npm run theia:install && yarn --cwd writenow-theia build:electron
scripts.theia:start:browser: npm run theia:install && yarn --cwd writenow-theia start:browser
scripts.theia:start:electron: npm run theia:install && yarn --cwd writenow-theia start:electron
scripts.lint: npm run contract:check && npm run theia:install && yarn --cwd writenow-theia/writenow-core build
